item.title: What to Avoid When You Do Job Test
item.description: I interview software engineers past 11 years and last 4 years I have average 1-2 interview per week. We usually don’t send a test to people with the experience we can easily confirm on an interview or by a background check, but for candidates with no or little experience, it is ok to send a test. item.title: How This Site Made and Site Generators
item.description: The older I become, the less I search for maximum cool solutions. Some solutions should be just good enough, even if far from perfect. For web site like a blog or personal page Wordpress or another CMS with dynamic content generation is just not needed. Also, it is good not to pay when you can (there is always a better place to use your money than amazon or your domestic hosting provider).
